meanings.sent1: I picked some delicious fung for our dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: The chef used fung to add flavor to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: The fung in the soup made it taste amazing!
meanings.sent4: The fung in the forest beckoned to be harvested.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh fung filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: If you leave bread out, it will fung quickly.
meanings.sent2: The damp environment caused the bread to fung overnight.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich began to fung in the lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting to clean the fridge can lead to food starting to fung.
meanings.sent5: The old books started to fung in the humid attic.

meanings.definition: A type of parasitic organism that feeds on organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The fung slowly consumed the decaying log in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their crops from harmful fung.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fung seemed to dance on the rotting fruit.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overrun with invasive fung, harming the plants.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the behavior of the fung under the microscope.
